“In an efficient market, prices ‘fully reflect’ all available information.” by Eugene F. Fama.

What is No-Arbitrage? ðŸŒ

No arbitrage is a modern finance concept: asset prices fully reflect all available information, rendering it impossible to consistently achieve returns exceeding average market returns on a risk-adjusted basis-â€”any discrepancy invites arbitrageurs to exploit the difference until equilibrium is restored. A sentinel of equilibrium that ensures capital flows to its most productive uses. Fascinating!
